channel.title: Abyssal whip attack animation
channel.description:
I've asked this a few times and am still seeking an answer. I'm guessing it's client-sided.
I'm wondering how to make the whip attack look like it does on Project Insanity sources (I do not want the new whip model).
I'm using Allstar and you may know that the whip looks deformed when it is swung to your back. I want it to look like the clean animation that PI has.
Any ideas on how I could go about doing this?

item.title: Abyssal whip attack animation
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Nope, not what I meant. Here are some videos.

My server’s whip attack animation:
http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=21e6ku9&s=7

A server just as PI’s attack animation:
http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=14blz7q&s=7

See how the whip in my server looks disfigured when the whip hits the enemy or is swung back? I want it to look like clean and be the right animation like RuneScape had it.

Read full topic

item.title: Abyssal whip attack animation
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

I’ll find it for you give me one sec.

spec 1658
block 1659
stand 1832;
walk 1660;
run 1661;

Read full topic
